text: Zooi nii feai wo ya ga wɔnɔ, ni naa ɠɔzɔʋɛ wo ɠaazu, à ʋa naama yooi zu, nii é ga Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI nɔnɔi, ʋɛ ná-seɠe ʋɛlɛ ɲadegai ɓɛtɛai ná, wo zei gi zaama. Kɛlɛ à mina wuzeɠe Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI laalɔɠɔma, à mina wuzeɠe gi laalɔɠɔma, wo ʋa ɓɔɠɔ zalaɠa ɠulazu lo, é ɠula Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI da-ƓALAGI nɔnɔi ʋolu.
